description:
Nick Reeves & Skylar Price go to the gym fairly regularly. Maxing out and trying to tone up, the two of them have become pretty close. Their other friend, Leon Styles, is not really into the gym scene, but he's decided to take them up on their offer to come by and work out the tension. Boy is Leon glad he came. In no time at all he realizes that not all the sweating done at the gym is the result of hard work. Some it is just the result of a hard cock!

Enjoy!
series: NDT - 8086 - Leon Styles, Skylar Price, Nick Reeves
title: Balls Out In The Gym
